Troy.Latham Circle:
The Latham Circle is the intersection of U.S. Route 9 (US 9) and New York State Route 2 (NY 2) within the town of Colonie, New York in Albany County.


== Description ==
The circle takes the name from the hamlet of Latham, of which the circle is close to the exact center. The circle was originally built as a large traffic circle in 1934 and in 1958 an underpass was built to give motorists the option to skip the circle and continue on US 9.
